modName: Gray Blades Katana Hilt and Sheath
summary: Retextured katana hilt and sheath to be gray instead of blue.
descriptionHtml:
Simple retexture of the blades katana hilt to be gray instead of blue, made to fit my Golden Blades Armor retexture & Gray Blades shield retexture or I guess the Neutralized Blades Gear mod.

Affects unique weapons that share the akaviri katana model like Dragonbane.

Golden Blades Armor: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1389

Gray Blades Shield: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1502
author: Jayhant
